solution_line_template: First find the total volume of the Mountain Dew: {num_cans_mountain_dew} cans * {oz_per_can_mountain_dew} oz/can = <<{num_cans_mountain_dew}*{oz_per_can_mountain_dew}={total_mountain_dew_volume}>>{total_mountain_dew_volume} oz

Then find the total volume of the punch: {total_mountain_dew_volume} oz + {ice_volume} oz + {fruit_juice_volume} oz = <<{total_mountain_dew_volume}+{ice_volume}+{fruit_juice_volume}={total_punch_volume}>>{total_punch_volume} oz

Then divide the total volume by the volume of each serving to find the number of servings: {total_punch_volume} oz / {serving_size} oz/serving = <<{total_punch_volume}/{serving_size}={num_servings}>>{num_servings} servings
